Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP11.controller.state

Interface GameState

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildState, MoveState, PlaceWorkerState, SelectGameGodsState, SelectPlayerGodState, StartTurnState
public interface GameState

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void applyBuild​(java.awt.Point point, boolean forceBuildDome)
    method used to actually build in the desired place
    void applyMove​(java.awt.Point point)
    method used to actually move the worker to the desired place
    boolean checkLose()
    method used to check if someone lost the game
    boolean checkWin()
    method used to check if there is a winner
    void endTurn()  
    GameState execute​(Message message, VirtualView virtualView)
    method used to decide witch action to do within the game state, based on the god's power
    void moveWorker()
    method used to give the player all the possible move position
    void placeWorker​(java.awt.Point point)
    method used to place the worker during the setup of the game
    void selectGameGods​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ids)
    method used to allow the challenger to select the gods that will be used in the game
    void selectPlayerGod​(int index)
    method used to allow the player to chose his god
    void selectWorker()
    method used to select the worker that the player wants to utilize this turn
    void startTurn()
    method used to check if some god powers can be activated also check for eventual player who have lost
    Message stateMessage()
    method used to send the player the right message
    void workerBuild()
    method used to give the player all the possible build position

      point - the desired location of the worker

      forceBuildDome - true if atlas power is activated

    • execute

      GameState execute​(Message message, VirtualView virtualView)
      method used to decide witch action to do within the game state, based on the god's power
      Parameters:
      message - message received from the client
      virtualView - of the current player
      Returns:
      the new state of the game
